subSections.title: Glyph origin
Etymology
subSections.text: Cognate with {{zh-l|褶|tr=-|lined dress}}, {{cog|bo|ལྟབ||to fold, gather up, to lay or put together}}, {{m|bo|ལྡེབ||to bend round or back, to turn round, to double down}}, {{m|bo|ལྡབ||to fold up, repeat, do again}}.

subSections.title: Pronunciation
subSections.text:
{{zh-pron
|m=dié
|c=daap6,dip6
|h=pfs=thia̍p
|md=tăk/diĕk
|md_note=tăk - colloquial; diĕk - literary
|mn=tha̍h/thia̍p/ml,twv:tia̍p
|mn_note=tha̍h - vernacular, thia̍p/tia̍p - literary
|mn-t=tah8/tiab8
|mn-t_note=tah8 - vernacular; tiab8 - literary
|w=5diq,5deq
|mc=y
|oc=y
|cat=v,a
}}

subSections.title: Definitions
subSections.text:
{{zh-hanzi}}

# to [[fold]]; to [[fold up]]
# to [[fold]] [[over]] in layers; to [[pile up]]; to be piled up
# [[pile]]
# [[layer]]
# to [[repeat]], to [[duplicate]]
# to be [[repetitious]]
# {{zh-alt-form|㲲}}
